text: Rakel Mateo Uriate (born 13 June 1975) is a Spanish paratriathlete who competes in international level events. She is three time Spanish paratriathlon champion and double European medalist. Mateo Uriate sustained paralysis in her left leg after an accident in 2001. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Biscay Category:Spanish female triathletes Category:Paratriathletes of Spain Category:Paratriathletes at the 2016 Summer Paralympics
title: Rakel Mateo
